name: Flappy Gus
description:
Flappy Bird clone where the bird is replaced by Gus Sorola from Roosterteeth.

Gus' face is drawn by Jordan Cwierz at Rooster Teeth and I made the other textures, inspired by Minecraft and the Tower of Pimps.

Sound is taken from a couple of RT Shorts.

Credit for the game idea and mechanics goes to Dong Nguyen, maker of Flappy Bird.

This is released under an MIT License. The source code can be found here.
